Name: An Egg Can Dream
About the game: Everyone has a dream, even an egg . Roll your way around to live out your dreams in a world where you don't always belong. You are an egg. You have goals, dreams, desires and a passion. Explore the world in a way that only an egg can and progress through the story of your life but watch out as an egg is a very fragile thing. Will you live out your dreams, or will you crack under the pressure of being something great? Third Person Rolling Action Crazy Difficult Platforming Interactive Physics Based Objects Explore unique environments through the perspective of an egg Comic Book Style Story Cut-Scenes Original Soundtrack by M0r53C0d3 Check Out One Of Our Other Games!
